description: The function is vulnerable to several types of attacks. It does not validate or sanitize the user input which can lead to Path Traversal (CWE-22) where an attacker can access and manipulate files outside of the intended directory. It also does not properly handle SQL queries which can lead to SQL Injection (CWE-89) where an attacker can manipulate SQL queries to view, modify, or delete data in the database. The function is also vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (CWE-79) where an attacker can inject malicious scripts to be executed on the user's browser.
